mapper.sql: tzid, uid, juid, money, tztime, nprofit, cpname, baid, resint1, resint2, resstr1, resstr2
mapper.insert:

tzid,
uid,
juid,
money,
tztime,
nprofit,
cpname,

mapper.update:
update tzb
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
juid = #{juid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tztime = #{tztime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nprofit = #{nprofit,jdbcType=REAL},
cpname = #{cpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baid = #{baid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resint1 = #{resint1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resint2 = #{resint2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resstr1 = #{resstr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resstr2 = #{resstr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tzid = #{tzid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tzb set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, juid = #{juid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tztime = #{tztime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nprofit = #{nprofit,jdbcType=REAL}, cpname = #{cpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baid = #{baid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resint1 = #{resint1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resint2 = #{resint2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resstr1 = #{resstr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resstr2 = #{resstr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tzid = #{tzid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT u.rname,t.money,t.tztime FROM tzb AS t,t_user AS u WHERE t.uid=u.uid AND t.baid=#{baid} limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}
SELECT count(t.tzid) FROM tzb AS t WHERE t.baid=#{baid}
SELECT * FROM tzb AS t WHERE uid=#{uid} and baid=#{baid}
